snippet: The attack on Saturday night comes after gunmen killed at least nine women who were administering polio vaccines in Kano, the major city in Nigeria’s predominantly Muslim north.
abstract: Nigerian officials say assailants in country's northeast have killed three North Korean doctors who were working for Yobe State government, beheading one of them; attack comes after gunmen killed at least nine women who were administering polio vaccines in major northern city of Kano; no one claims responsibility for the attack, but suspicion is directed at Islamist sect Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: The attack on Saturday night comes after gunmen killed at least nine women who were administering polio vaccines in Kano, the major city in Nigeria’s predominantly Muslim north.

headline.main: 3 North Korean Doctors Are Killed in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: 3 North Korean Doctors Are Killed in Nigeria
